New Records: India won the match by 86 runs.
Arshdeep Singh was named Man of the Match for his bowling performance.
Key Match Events: Bangladesh were restricted to a low total in their innings.
Key wickets fell at crucial moments, including Hardik Pandya's catch and Abhishek Sharma's debut wicket.
The match was won by India with a significant margin.
Pre-Game Insights: India aimed to secure an unassailable lead in the series.
Bangladesh looked to improve their batting performance after the first match.
Post-Match Reflections: The win gave India a 2-0 lead in the series.
Players and fans celebrated the dominant performance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Weather conditions and pitch report were discussed before the match.
The match was available for live streaming and had a detailed scorecard.
Others: The match was the second T20I of the three-match series.
